testDecrypt

public static boolean testDecrypt(int[] decryptedValues,
                                  int[] originalNums)
Test to determine whether the decryption process was successful (output matches what user inputted at start)

Parameters:
decryptedValues - Series of integers obtained after decryption procedure
originalNums - Series of integers obtained from user at start
Returns:
true if the decryption was successful, false otherwise
